channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft -- GroupMe
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft -- GroupMe

item.title: CVE-2024-38176|2024-08-02T04:04:25.098Z -- microsoft -- groupme
item.description: An improper restriction of excessive authentication attempts in GroupMe allows a unauthenticated attacker to elevate privileges over a network.

item.title: CVE-2024-38164|2024-08-02T04:04:25.345Z -- microsoft -- groupme
item.description: An improper access control vulnerability in GroupMe allows an a unauthenticated attacker to elevate privileges over a network by convincing a user to click on a malicious link.
